Posts.Content: sharita wrote: I live in the washington DC area and I wanted to see if anyone would recommend me to a medical oncologist newly diagnosed with stage 2 breast ca an oncologist from Georgetown university hospital which is close to where I live I am young in my 40's this is a hard diagnosis and I am happy we have a place to support each other please help if you have a great oncologist you can refer from Georgetown hospital any recommendations will be well appreciated thank you for being there for each other Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: oncologist recommendation in my area sharita sharita

Posts.Content: sharita wrote: I was diagnosed with stage 2 breast ca . had bilateral mastectomy radiation no chemo though I had a positive lymph node my MO said I do not need chemo I had implants called breast expanders which got infected and I had to go back to the operating room and had the implants removed iv antibiotics and I am on zoledex and tamoxifen my mai problem is swelling on my feet and a lot of pain on my feet and is very painful to walk if try to excercise my legs hurts a lot after just walking I have not worked now for more than 8 months I just stay home an rest when I was stared on the zoledex and tamoxifen my tummy became very big which is very worrying me anyone of you with such problems I am so concerned please help me with some ideas I hope I will be well thank you Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: swelling of both feet a concern sharita sharita

Posts.Content: Aug 6, 2015 09:20PM sharita wrote: thank you Diane I appreciate and I saw him today he is changing me to the AL's but I know those have terrible side effects too I am really suffering thanks for caring
Posts.Title: swelling of both feet a concern sharita sharita

Posts.Content: sharita wrote: i starting Anastrazole after taking tamoxifen for 6 months my oncologist put me first on Zoladex injection to reverse the effects of estrogen and after i slipped into menopause he started me on this new drug anastrozole any stories positive and any stories of side effects and too those with positive stories or any kind of input ti share stage 2a breast ca had mastectomy bilateral , radiation and now oral homonal my Dr said i do not need chemo oncytype is 13 or 15 nit 100 % sure thank you already !!!!!! Posts.Title: starting anastrozole ( ADREMIX ) sharita maxdog

Posts.Content: Apr 4, 2015 11:30PM sharita wrote: I also was a stage 2a I lymph node out of 2 was positive I had a double mastectomy with expanded started on Tami and now on radiation therapy x 25 doses my oncologist said I did not need to take chemo I had multiple nodule on my breast about 6 of them though they said they were small I am just so scared that the Tamil alone with radiation may not be enough and i so concerned and am just so scared that this may not be enough my DR did a ct scan of the abdomen and saw some 2 spots on my liver but he said they were not lesions but we're hemengioma's now my legs are swelling since after surgery 3 months ago I am not sure if this is not because of those spots on my liver I am so worried please help me with ideas I know I put a lot of questions here but I have a lot of unanswered questions let me know if you have any answers for me thanks for being just here to support each other
